channel.title: Switching weapon hand + more
channel.description:
Ive asked this question ages ago but still... 1) Is it able to swap the hand you hold your weapon in.... like wielding a maul on your right hand and a whip on the other? (not putting the maul in the shield bit stuff....) 2)Can you turn your char into red (like your hands completely red)
thx :)

item.title: Switching weapon hand + more
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Surfingpikachao:

there’s probably a way but stuff like gmaul’s look REALLY seriosuly buggered holding one handed. A bit like thunderfury in WoW if you play that. It just looks messed up. it happens if you’re holding a gmaul while being a member and then are converted to non member and are still holding it in the real RS. I assume you tried search btw?

Yes to all of them ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Switching weapon hand + more
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“IP, post:2, topic:90922”]I think there is a way. But it will not be in your server. It would have to be in your client.

Im not sure how to do this though, sorry[/quote]

ok, thx anyway

tacoboyy:

uhh i know you can make a dagger go to yuor hand you hold yoursheild in so i think you could i don;t see why not…

Not that, thats as easy as pie, im talking about moving the weapon char from one hand to another.
